divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were driving back to my house on a main road of our town. He was actually first to spot this and quickly as I looked to our right I spotted it too. It was a bright blue light that was floating in mid air above the road we looked down. Street lights we on in the vicinity and we saw nothing that could explain this or that was connected to the light. We drove past as the light didnt flicker or fludder, we quickly went back to check on what it was, but when we returned the light was gone.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Superior
There were no other sightings in Superior on or around May 25th 2012
